title: Did Boko Haram block Nigeria's pastors after "he was raised from Christ's preaching? "
subtitle: The readers inquired about the details surrounding the appalling execution of the priest. Luann Andemi in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2020, Boko Haram executed Pastor Luan Andemi as a result, at least in part, of his refusal to renounce his Christian religion.
